name: Scare Girl 2
description: Scare Girl 2 takes place at a haunted house you are trying to collect 10 radio to open a door to escape the house from the killer. The killer will try to catch you so you run and try to collect the 10 radio to open a door to escape. Running helps you get away from the killer. There are also a zombie mode in the game to shoot and kill zombies. But the game takes place at a haunted house that has enemies. This game is a horror survival game. So basically your running in a haunted house that has killers and your trying to collect 10 radio to open a escape door.
